scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run bundle:worker && npm run bundle:app
scripts.bundle:worker: browserify dist/worker.js > dist/worker.bundle.js && uglifyjs dist/worker.bundle.js --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle --output dist/worker.min.js
scripts.bundle:app: browserify dist/app.js > dist/app.bundle.js && uglifyjs dist/app.js --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle --output dist/app.min.js
